reviews.review: Game Of The Year BTW...

[h1] Half-Life 2: Lost Coast[/h1]
Písanie recenzie by nemalo byť dlhšie ako hranie samotnej hry, takže len v skratke. Doslova a do písmena 
prejdenie hry zaberie zhruba 15 minút a samotní autori uvádzajú, že ide len o nevydanú časť z hry HL:2, u ktorej chceli hráčom prezentovať nové mechaniky. Hodnotiť ani v podstate nie je čo a tento výtvor by som skôr prirovnal k narezanej jarnej cibuľke, ktorá je posypaná na bryndzových haluškách. Ako ozdoba Half-Life 2 pre gurmánov fajn, ale ako samostatný výtvor sa to veľmi recenzovať nedá.

[b]Achievement hunteri:[/b] Odídu naprázdno.
[b]Pomer cena a zábava:[/b] Jedine zadarmo.
[b]Celkový dojem z hry:[/b] ★★★/5.
It's pretty short, but it's fun.
經典
Эта штука мне приехала паровозом к 2 халфе, скажу одно, геймплей на 20 минут, я прошëл еë так, для галочки.
lost cum
流程超短 速通的话甚至可以5分钟玩完 而且还是买半条命2或1，2章的附赠品 但画质到现在都可以吊打某些游戏 HDR原本是要用在半条命2上的 但因为考虑到配置问题取消了 很难想象半条命2加上HDR会是什么画质
is nice 20 min game
Fast Headcrab jumpscared me
It's half life. What more can be said.

Despite it literally being a cut part of Highway 17 and just a tech demo for HDR, its absolutely amazing.

This demo shows how powerful the source engine is when it comes to HDR lighting, its like RTXs little, weaker brother.

Gameplay and combat wise its the same as HL2 but i do like it when the combine try to ambush or flank me on the stairs.

Music is sad? it fits in very well after almost reaching the end.

One thing that bothers me about this is that this was meant to be a cut part of highway 17, yet this doesnt fit in at any part of the chapter. my guess is that they removed it because its obscurity with the rest of H17 or they remade/rebuilt the chapter from the ground up.

9/10
kinda half assed but good
Not a game per se, just a mediocre playground for some experimental visual settings and physics.
it definitely exists
It destroyed my graphics when it came out :D Still a lovely short game.
i think it would be funny if instead of lost coast it was called lost poop
where is the coast and why is it lost
I don't get it...
crowbar guy gopes fishing for 15 minutes and kills at least 40 people in that time
练英语听力用的

This is just an additional level in the Half Life 2 game where the developers created it with a more focused purpose to showcase how they developed the HL2 and what are some of the meticulous details they had to take into account to ensure the quality of the audio, visual and mechanics can give players a great gaming experience.

Not something I would recommend you to download and play because again, this is just an additional level where the developers create narrations of how they developed the game.

画面确实比HL2进步了很多，HDR自动曝光效果很棒，让画面不会灰蒙蒙的。阴影分辨率也更高了，人物质感也更精细了，那种恐怖谷的感觉没有了。特别是那湿沙滩和湿岩石，质感真是太棒了，用瞄具放大后那质感真是太惊艳了。

教堂的光影、金属装饰物反射和墙壁的反射真是太美了，有色玻璃的折射也好棒，可惜穹顶有渲染BUG，根据视角会突然变亮变暗。

水的平面反射很棒，不会有像屏幕空间反射那样，一低头反射就消失的缺点，可惜屏幕左右两侧有反射瑕疵，应该是视锥剔除有点激进了，所以模型刚出水平视角就被剔除，导致视角边缘的反射出现了错误。

weird little demo for Half-Life 2. somehow I have 90+ hours in this game (no idea how, the game itself only takes about 20 min to beat). The story is pretty simple, Gordon Freeman breaks a headcrab canister, fights a hunter chopper, and saves St. Olga. as far as canonicity to the Half-Life series goes, St. Olga is a canon area (according to a poster Half-Life Alyx), but as for the events of this game themselves, I'm not sure whether or not they are cannon. Perhaps this was a test for Gordon by the gman...
7/10
Лёгкая и быстрая игра, первый раз играл и мог бы пройти быстрее но застрял в некоторых моментах. Игра хороша.
Senhorzinho pescador gente boa.
Klein aber fein! Ich bin alt und darf von der Grafik begeistert sein! Nettes Gimmick, um die Wartezeit bis HL 3 zu verkürzen... wenn es denn kommt!

Помогите деду зачистить церковь от комбайнов, гаубицы и боевого вертолета. Также имеется возможность послушать Габена сотоварищи о некоторых технических аспектах разработки. Технодемо оно и есть технодемо.

This really short showcase of High Dynamic range lighting is interesting to explore just to see one of the cut maps from Half Life 2. It comes free with Half Life 2 so I don't see why exactly its bad. I guess I recommend this just to explore more of the beautiful world of HL2.
